response.overview: Marcia Tiburi and Jean Wyllys, Brazilian activists, exchange letters reflecting on the reasons that compelled them to leave Brazil. Their reading of these letters, while still in exile, reveals a lot about the rise of the far-right in Brazil, but also about themselves.
response.tagline: Synopsis Marcia Tiburi and Jean Wyllys, Brazilian activists, exchange letters reflecting on the reasons that compelled them to leave Brazil.
response.title: Hoje longe, muitas léguas
